title: How to Make Felt Christmas Goodies

steps.headline: Use felt to make decorations.
Make felt stockings for Santa's goodies to be left in.
steps.description: Stockings have long been made from felt and the variations on designs are endless. It's a great way to use up scrap pieces of felt for the design. Read How to make a Christmas stocking for more details.

steps.headline: Make gift packaging from felt.
steps.description:
Make a felt gift cover that can be reused for other purposes after gifting, such as holding stationery, covering a book, holding bits and pieces, etc. Make little felt bags to hold items like iPods, candies, and other small gifts. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/35\/Make-Felt-Christmas-Goodies-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Make-Felt-Christmas-Goodies-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/3\/35\/Make-Felt-Christmas-Goodies-Step-3Bullet1.jpg\/v4-760px-Make-Felt-Christmas-Goodies-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":319,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":527.1978021978022,"licensing":"

steps.headline: Make the Christmas tree skirt from felt.
steps.description: Felt is ideal for covering the base of the Christmas tree. Red felt is a good color for this purpose.

steps.headline: Make cards from felt.
steps.description: Use scrap pieces of felt to create Christmas designs on card that provide a lovely raised, tactile feel to the card. Read the homemade cards articles on wikiHow for more ideas.
